metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5838 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in extensions API in Google Chrome prior to75.0.3770.80 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass restrictions on file URIs via a craftedChrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
